quest.name: Her Splendid Materials
journal:
Qhoterl Pasol has the glint of inspiration in her eyes.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested supplies to Qhoterl Pasol.
objectives: Mine splendid stones in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid stones to Qhoterl PasolGather splendid nuts in the K'mul AstropolisDeliver the splendid nuts to Qhoterl PasolCatch a splendid shellfish at Mjrl's TearsDeliver the splendid shellfish to Qhoterl Pasol.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Good day, MadamSir Forename! You look to be the well-traveled sort─have your journeys taken you to the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I ask because one of the noble Viis told me of the owl statues housed within the pyramid, equipped with deadly traps meant to deter even the most intrepid grave robbers. Upon hearing the story, I was struck with inspiration.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I realized these very ruins could be equipped with such measures! Our surroundings are positively lousy with vicious beasts, and a few clever traps would go a long way to set everyone's mind at ease. Could I trouble you to assist me in making them?

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The device I have in mind will make use of the latent energies stored within magical stones. If you would bring me some from the K'mul Astropolis, I would be ever so grateful.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The device I envision will make use of the latent energy stored in the nuts strewn about the K'mul Astropolis. I would be ecstatic if you could gather some and bring them to me.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: I have designed a device which makes use of the potent energy stored within the pearls of the shellfish dotting Mjrl's Tears. While fishing them up from the depths may seem a daunting task, use fruit worms as bait and you'll be done before I even have a chance to miss you.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The latent power stored within the stones littered about the K'mul Astropolis ought to be just what I need. I'll wait here patiently until you return.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The nuts flourishing near the K'mul Astropolis are bursting with arcane energy, which should make for a trap as deadly as it is delicious.

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: The pearls that can be found in Mjrl's Tears are seeping with arcane energy, which should make for a sufficiently potent trap. Please go and snag some shellfish─but remember to use fruit worms when you do!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: You're back! Do you have the materials I asked for? Please say yes─I can feel the fiends encroaching further by the moment!

dialogue.name: QHOTERLPASOL
dialogue.text: Ah, yes, dangerous and breathtaking! With these I'll fashion an arcane scarecrow that is as lethal as its visage is menacing! I mustn't make it too bone-chilling, of course, lest my Chaqurl soil himself in terror! Hah!
